page.title: 02TUNSTEAD QUARRY DESCRIPTION
page.content:
Tunstead Quarry was opened in 1929. The limestone{is 300 millon years {old.}The Quarry is 2\ km long and 1\ km wide. There are three vertical stages, the bottom two are each about 20 metres deep and the top one varies from 5 to 30 metres. It is{the purest {limestone in Europe }97% of it is used as limestone.
Twenty years ago over 1000 men worked there,but the work force has fallen to 600 because{they now have bigger and {better technology. { The quarry is very dirty, dusty and muddy.There are lots of dangers like moving vehicles,moving conveyor belts, electricity, gas and occasionally falling rocks and stones.
